message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15000 for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $15000 is a good price, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still working within my budget and would like to propose an offer of $16500 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $17000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and am willing to agree on a price of $16250 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $16500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued flexibility. I am now willing to agree on a price of $16000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $16100. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've carefully considered your last offer. I am now willing to agree on a price of $16050 for the product.
